name: OPE_INFO
description: This table stores order performable information.

columns.name: OPE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the performable order record.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the account record.

columns.name: LOGIN_DEPT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: PAT_LINK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record associated with the orders performed record for this row.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The hidden or visible status of the record.
